name: Red Cooked Wild Boar
recipeIngredient: 4 tbsp Chinese rice wine or dry sherry,
25 g fresh ginger (peeled and finely grated),
5-6 x 5mm ( 1/4 inch) dried Chinese tangerine peel,
1/2 tsp Sichuan peppercorn (dry roasted and grounded).
recipeInstructions: 1. Put diced wild boar into bowl with soy sauce, mix well together and rest for 20 minutes.
2. Preheat oven to 160C/325F gas mark 3. Heat the oil in a medium sized oven-proof casserole dish to 190C/375F.
3. Lift wild boar out of soy sauce and deep fry in batches, turning until nicely brown.
4. Discard the cooking oil, return the wild boar to the casserole dish and add the remaining soy sauce and all the other ingredients.
5. Cover with a well fitting lid and cook in the oven for 1 1/2 hours, until the meat is really tender.
